info.author: Michael J.T. O'Kelly
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
PyTesser is an Optical Character Recognition module for Python. It takes as
input an image or image file and outputs a string.

PyTesser uses the Tesseract OCR engine, converting images to an accepted format
and calling the Tesseract executable as an external script. A Windows executable
is provided along with the Python scripts. The scripts should work in other
operating systems as well.
info.keywords: Python, OCR, Optical Character Recognition, Tesseract
info.name: PyTesser
info.summary: Optical Character Recognition module for Python

PyTesser uses the Tesseract OCR engine, converting images to an accepted format and calling the Tesseract executable as an external script. A Windows executable is provided along with the Python scripts. The scripts should work in other operating systems as well.
